description: System-generated unique identifier for this privilege target record; used as the primary key.
Internal identifier of the application object (e.g., report/widget) this privilege applies to.
Enumerated code for the category of object being secured (report, dashboard, menu, etc.); mapping defined by application configuration—confirm with SME.
System timestamp for the most recent change to this record.
Timestamp of the last user-initiated modification to this record; may mirror the system value—confirm with SME.
User account that originally created this record (creator's identifier).
Timestamp when this record was first created.
User account that most recently updated this record.
Timestamp of the most recent update performed by a user.
